scripts.dev-claims: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite --force
scripts.dev-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DESTROY=true SW_DEV=true vite --force
scripts.dev-claims-destroy: rimraf dev-dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa SW_DESTROY=true SW_DEV=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite --force
scripts.build: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true vite build
scripts.run-build: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-claims: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-claims: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-claims: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-claims-reloadsw: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true vite build
scripts.run-build-reloadsw-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-destroy: rimraf dist && DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true SW=true vite build
scripts.run-build-sw-reloadsw-claims-destroy: DEBUG=vite-plugin-pwa BASE_URL=/ SOURCE_MAP=true SW_DESTROY=true CLAIMS=true RELOAD_SW=true SW=true vite build
scripts.test-build-claims: nr run-build-claims && vitest run && playwright test
scripts.test-build-sw-claims: nr run-build-sw-claims && SW=true vitest run && SW=true playwright test
